alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 24 at 1:26PM EDT until March 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 PM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Wind gusts may subside for a time during the late morning hours, before increasing to near 50 mph again by early afternoon. * WHERE...Fayette, Higher Elevations of Fayette, Higher Elevations of Westmoreland, Higher Elevations of Indiana, and Westmoreland Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 8 PM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges
